system_boundaries.description: Defines the components and functions that are under the control of the Digital Banking Platform and those it depends on but does not control.

assumptions.reliability: Assumes high availability and security of the applications.

constraints.update_cycle: Limited by app store review processes.

assumptions.availability: Assumes multi-region deployment ensures high availability.

constraints.vendor_dependency: Subject to the terms and performance of the cloud service provider.

assumptions.compliance: Assumes all processors are PCI-DSS compliant.

constraints.network_downtime: Potential downtime affecting payment processing capabilities.

assumptions.security: Assumes robust security measures for API access.

constraints.scalability: Must scale to support increasing transaction volumes.

system_boundaries.description: Indicates where trust levels change within the system, necessitating authentication, authorization, or data validation.

definition_criteria.criterion1: Transition from untrusted to trusted zones

assumptions.security: Assumes each request is authenticated and authorized appropriately.

constraints.rate_limiting: Must prevent denial of service attacks.

assumptions.MFA: Assumes Multi-factor Authentication is enforced for all users.

constraints.user_experience: Balancing security with ease of use.

system_boundaries.description: Outlines the division of legal and contractual responsibilities between the banking platform and external entities.

assumptions.compliance: Platform is fully responsible for GDPR, PCI-DSS compliance.

constraints.third_party_risks: Dependent on third-party compliance for shared data.

assumptions.contractual_agreements: Assumes all third parties adhere to agreed security standards.

constraints.monitoring_difficulty: Challenging to monitor third-party compliance continuously.

system_boundaries.description: Defines where ownership and responsibility for data protection change, as well as where data classification may vary.

assumptions.encryption: All customer financial data is encrypted at rest and in transit.

constraints.access_control: Strict access controls are necessary to protect sensitive data.

assumptions.data_protection_agreements: Assumes data shared with third parties is protected under contractual agreements.

constraints.compliance_verification: Ongoing verification of third-party compliance is required.
